channel.title: My offer to YOU
channel.description:
Need a server? Your own Private Server? Ill make and code one for you, you decide what you want and I code it.
I'm willing to make you a server for you. ( I CODE EVERYTHING FOR YOU )
Choices:
1) I'll code it and send you files...you host it.
2) I'll code it and host it for you. (almost 24/7) --> It's your server, not mine. --> You decide every update you want. I don't --> Client Side / Server Side --> I make you your own site or forums. --> You are the owner of everything (Forums, Site, Server Etc) COST:
Everytime you wan't a update: I will charge you depending on the update (Were talking like 50 cents, very cheap)
Example: I want you to make potions, working. (Price: 30 cents)
I only accept money on paypal
email: soccer15_154@hotmail.com
~SMITTY

item.title: My offer to YOU
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You really don’t get it do you, when I lock a topic I don’t want you to post another one breaking the same rules.

Read full topic
